job_details.Functieomschrijving:
For our client in Amsterdam, we are looking for a Cloud Engineer (Terraform, Azure Devops)

   Your mission will be to ensure the improvement of our products with a team and supporting all countries in reaching their targets by providing smart advanced analytics solutions, to strengthen the clients leadership in digitalization & support our 40 million customers.

   We work in a fun and creative environment, and we're dedicated to bringing out the best in both our relations and our projects, ranging from enhancing our virtual assistants in production via innovative NLP techniques such as Generative AI and Large Language Models to building speech analytics use cases across all the countries our client operates in.

   The opportunity: As a cloud solution engineer, you will be partnering with Data Analysts and Customer Journey Experts (CJE) to design and implement Google Cloud Native infrastructure for the use of leading-edge conversational AI products, such as a compliant generative AI chatbot. As a Cloud Engineer, you understand business needs, can architect GCP cloud solutions, understand data needs, and can inform on using the right cloud solutions to operationalize the conversational platform and thus increase our clients contact center agents' efficiencies. You can with the GCP APIs and code pipelines to support the team's needs. You can productize and operationalize (GCP) cloud-native applications for production environments.

   You Will Be Responsible For
     * Implementation and productionalization of cloud solutions using Generative AI and LLM technologies.
     * Advice on which Google Cloud Platform products to use.
     * Making cloud designs and technical decisions for conversational systems projects at clients Analytics.
     * Creating data pipelines that interact with DialogFlow.
     * Implementing GCP native ML architectures.
     * Contributing to strengthening the cloud capability within the team.
     * Implementing Looker Dashboards, BigQuery datasets/views, and working with Vertex AI Search and Conversation API.
     * Writing code to interact with GCP API's.
     * Automation of team bottlenecks., * You will work on a project that is considered to be innovative for ING.
     * A challenging working environment, that can be considered to have the characteristics of a startup within the safety of a large company.
     * International working environment; TECH/Group Services is bank wide provider of IT solutions, hence AI solutions you work on will often be used globally.
     * A culture where generating new ideas is are highly appreciated.
     * We work in an agile way.
     * 36/40 hours.
job_details.full_text:
Cloud Engineer (Terraform, Azure Devops)

For our client in Amsterdam, we are looking for a Cloud Engineer (Terraform, Azure Devops)

   Your mission will be to ensure the improvement of our products with a team and supporting all countries in reaching their targets by providing smart advanced analytics solutions, to strengthen the clients leadership in digitalization & support our 40 million customers.

   We work in a fun and creative environment, and we're dedicated to bringing out the best in both our relations and our projects, ranging from enhancing our virtual assistants in production via innovative NLP techniques such as Generative AI and Large Language Models to building speech analytics use cases across all the countries our client operates in.

   The opportunity: As a cloud solution engineer, you will be partnering with Data Analysts and Customer Journey Experts (CJE) to design and implement Google Cloud Native infrastructure for the use of leading-edge conversational AI products, such as a compliant generative AI chatbot. As a Cloud Engineer, you understand business needs, can architect GCP cloud solutions, understand data needs, and can inform on using the right cloud solutions to operationalize the conversational platform and thus increase our clients contact center agents' efficiencies. You can with the GCP APIs and code pipelines to support the team's needs. You can productize and operationalize (GCP) cloud-native applications for production environments.

   You Will Be Responsible For
     * Implementation and productionalization of cloud solutions using Generative AI and LLM technologies.
     * Advice on which Google Cloud Platform products to use.
     * Making cloud designs and technical decisions for conversational systems projects at clients Analytics.
     * Creating data pipelines that interact with DialogFlow.
     * Implementing GCP native ML architectures.
     * Contributing to strengthening the cloud capability within the team.
     * Implementing Looker Dashboards, BigQuery datasets/views, and working with Vertex AI Search and Conversation API.
     * Writing code to interact with GCP API's.
     * Automation of team bottlenecks., * You will work on a project that is considered to be innovative for ING.
     * A challenging working environment, that can be considered to have the characteristics of a startup within the safety of a large company.
     * International working environment; TECH/Group Services is bank wide provider of IT solutions, hence AI solutions you work on will often be used globally.
     * A culture where generating new ideas is are highly appreciated.
     * We work in an agile way.
     * 36/40 hours.

job_profile_classification.rationale: The role heavily emphasizes building and operationalizing applications using Generative AI and LLM technologies, including RAG-like interactions with DialogFlow and Vertex AI Search. While cloud infrastructure is a focus, the core objective is to deploy and maintain user-facing conversational AI products, aligning with the GenAI Engineer profile.

phrases: ensure the improvement of our products with a team and supporting all countries in reaching their targets by providing smart advanced analytics solutions
strengthen the clients leadership in digitalization
understand business needs
increase our clients contact center agents' efficiencies
job_tasks.justification: These phrases indicate a need to understand the business goals, how the AI solutions contribute to them, and the impact on user efficiency.

phrases: Creating data pipelines that interact with DialogFlow
BigQuery datasets/views
job_tasks.justification: The mention of creating data pipelines and managing BigQuery datasets/views points to data engineering responsibilities.

phrases: enhancing our virtual assistants in production via innovative NLP techniques such as Generative AI and Large Language Models
building speech analytics use cases
design and implement Google Cloud Native infrastructure for the use of leading-edge conversational AI products, such as a compliant generative AI chatbot
Implementation and productionalization of cloud solutions using Generative AI and LLM technologies
Implementing GCP native ML architectures
working with Vertex AI Search and Conversation API
job_tasks.justification: This category is strongly represented by phrases related to Generative AI, LLMs, NLP, conversational AI, and specific GCP ML services like Vertex AI.

phrases: partnering with Data Analysts and Customer Journey Experts (CJE) to design and implement Google Cloud Native infrastructure
architect GCP cloud solutions
inform on using the right cloud solutions to operationalize the conversational platform
You can with the GCP APIs and code pipelines to support the team's needs
productize and operationalize (GCP) cloud-native applications for production environments
Writing code to interact with GCP API's
Automation of team bottlenecks
job_tasks.justification: The role involves designing, implementing, and productizing cloud solutions, writing code for GCP APIs, and automating processes, which are core software development activities in a cloud context.

phrases: productionalization of cloud solutions using Generative AI and LLM technologies
operationalize the conversational platform
productize and operationalize (GCP) cloud-native applications for production environments
Azure Devops
job_tasks.justification: Phrases like 'productionalization', 'operationalize', and 'productize' directly relate to MLOps and deploying solutions into production environments. Azure DevOps is also mentioned, which is an MLOps tool.

phrases: partnering with Data Analysts and Customer Journey Experts (CJE)
team
soft_skills.justification: The role requires collaboration with other teams and experts to design and implement solutions.

phrases: strengthening the cloud capability within the team
challenging working environment
characteristics of a startup within the safety of a large company
agile way
soft_skills.justification: The mention of a startup-like environment, agile methodology, and strengthening team capabilities suggests a need for continuous learning and adaptation.

phrases: ensure the improvement of our products
supporting all countries in reaching their targets by providing smart advanced analytics solutions
Automation of team bottlenecks
increase our clients contact center agents' efficiencies
soft_skills.justification: The role is focused on solving business problems by providing solutions that improve products, reach targets, and increase efficiency.

phrases: compliant generative AI chatbot
soft_skills.justification: The mention of a 'compliant' chatbot implies a consideration for ethical and legal aspects of AI deployment.

phrases: innovative NLP techniques
leading-edge conversational AI products
project that is considered to be innovative for ING
generating new ideas is are highly appreciated
characteristics of a startup within the safety of a large company
soft_skills.justification: The job description repeatedly highlights innovation, new ideas, and a startup-like environment, suggesting a need for ownership and initiative.
